DOC.brief_summary: To test cognitive abilities of 8-11 year old children under conditions of fasting or receiving a full school breakfast.
DOC.brief_title: The Effects of Breakfast on Brain Function
DOC.criteria: 811 years old Between 25th and 95th percentile, BMIforage food allergies or some intolerances uncorrected vision IQ < 80 Other chronic conditions thought to interfere with the study as determined by the investigator
